charinfo.name: Ittan (S)
charinfo.description: Ittan (S) is a Hidden Rock Village shinobi. Ittan (S) is battle hardened and extremely calm during battle.

abilities.name: Battlefield Trenches
abilities.description: Ittan (S) uses Battlefield Trenches. All enemies will take 20% more damage* for 2 turns and damage dealt to Ittan (S) will be reduced by 15.

abilities.name: Moving Earth Core
abilities.description: Ittan (S) uses Moving Earth Core on one enemy dealing 30 damage. Damage that enemy deals will be reduced by 10 the following turn.

abilities.name: Earth Dome
abilities.description: Using Earth Dome Ittan (S) protects one ally and himself from enemy ranged skills for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Trench Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Ittan (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
